import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { ModalContext } from '../context/ModalContext' function Signup() { const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ "username": '', "email": '', "password": '' }) const {setOpenSignupModal: closeModal} = useContext(ModalContext) handleDataChange = e => { const newUserData = { ...userData } newUserData[e.target.id] = e.target.value setUserData(newUserData) console.log(newU); } return (
Signup here!
) } export default Signup
